title: Congo (1995) [The sign-talking gorilla] DVDrip
description:
<a href="http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0112715/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0112715/</a>

Charming story of a gorilla learning to speak with the help of sign language and a computer device -- mixed up with an action-filled treasure hunt in Africa.

This is not my rip, I found it on the net using PirateBay's tracker, so I thought it should be found here.
Widescreen, good stereo, 608x352, AC3 6 channels

Burn tested, runs well in my standalone DivX player.
